Literature.Title: Effects of cyclic lipodepsipeptide structural modulation on stability, antibacterial activity, and human cell toxicity.
Literature.Author: Bionda N, Stawikowski M, Stawikowska R, Cudic M, López-Vallejo F, Treitl D, Medina-Franco J, Cudic P

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=32 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:45% Hemolysis=64 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:90% Hemolysis=128 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 700699(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 27626(MIC=8µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 19615(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12 ATCC 29181(no activity data),Klebsiella pneumoniae K6 ATCC 700603(no activity data)
